thread.section_title: Flizzr opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Flizzr | www.flizzr.com
thread.title: Maria

author: Maria
title: Maria
text: I rented a car from Zurich Airport. I booked the car before I read the comments on Trustpilot and I was kind of scared that I'd be getting myself into a cost trap. However, I don't really understand all the negative comments. The price was really cheap, the pick-up easy, the car was super clean and I didn't have to pay for any extra costs. I booked my insurance when I picked up the car at the counter though, not from rentalcars, because it takes forever to get the money back from rentalcars when something actually happens. In a nutshell, I'd book again.
